stadium.name: The Hollow Mine
stadium.description: The playing field is the circular, wildflower-covered clearing at the base of the imposing, ivy-covered Watch Tower. The ground hums with a strange energy, and the home team makes their entrance from the newly-opened mine shaft that bores deep into the tower's foundation.

stats.pregame_ritual: Seeing how many dried beans they can fit in their nostril.
Counting the number of clouds in the sky.
Braiding a teammate's nose hair.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Asking the referee to bless their weapon.
Giving a rambling, often nonsensical 'pump-up' speech.
Braiding a teammate's nose hair.
Tugging on their left earlobe three times.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Finding the muddiest puddle and stomping in it with bare feet.
Insisting on wearing a ridiculously oversized, floppy hat during warm-ups.
Counting the number of clouds in the sky.
Braiding a teammate's nose hair.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.

stadium.name: The Buccaneer's Bowl
stadium.description: A flashy, pristine stadium built on a private beach exclusively for resort guests. The field is imported turf, and a massive, puppet kraken in the bay entertains the crowd at halftime.

stats.pregame_ritual: Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Sticking leeches to their legs to 'lighten their step'.
Bribing a local oracle with a meat pie for a vague prophecy.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Thanking their armor for the protection it's about to offer.
Painting their teeth with a mixture of charcoal and water.
Doing a series of loud, guttural breathing exercises.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Sticking leeches to their legs to 'lighten their step'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Doing a series of loud, guttural breathing exercises.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.

preGame:
GOOD EVENING, BLOODSPORTS FANS! üéôÔ∏è This is your favorite demon, Nok the Corrupter, broadcasting LIVE from the buzzing, vibrant grounds of The Hollow Mine! The air is thick with magic, the ground is literally humming beneath our feet, and the smell of impending violence is sweeter than any perfume! It is a beautiful night for a beatdown in Wyrmwood Hollow! üí•

Tonight, we have a clash of lifestyles! In one corner, wearing the flashy gear probably paid for by overpriced resort cocktails, it's **The Tortell Privateers**! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è They hail from the lands of Cedar Hill, under the watchful, overly-friendly eyes of Elspeth Ortell. I hear she's the 'friendliest person' in Osterra. Ugh! Disgusting! I bet she packed them lunch boxes with little encouraging notes! I prefer my leaders like I prefer my steak‚Äîbloody and ruthless!

And facing them, emerging from the literal bowels of the earth via that gaping mine shaft, are **The Wyrmwood Stronghammers**! ‚öíÔ∏è These folks represent The Grove, the domain of High Priestess Oona! Now *she* knows how to execute a game plan... and her enemies! These miners are tough, gritty, and ready to bury the competition!

I‚Äôve been watching the warm-ups, and folks, the rituals are getting intense! Godart Urissa is wearing a hat big enough to sail a ship on‚Äîbold choice for a combat sport! And look at this‚Äîwe have a synchronization of stomachs! Both Dib Tufts of the Privateers and Autumn Jodoin of the Stronghammers are downing raw eggs! Shell and all! ü•ö It‚Äôs a battle of the iron guts before the battle of the iron wills!

Will the resort kids handle the grit of the mine? Will the Stronghammers smash through the defenses? Grab a drink, pick a side, and PRAY FOR INJURIES! Let‚Äôs play TROLLBALL! üëπ
postGame:
HOLY INFERNAL COMBUSTION! What a match! What a war of attrition! If you like high-scoring technical displays, you probably hated this! But if you like watching people get absolutely pulverized into the dirt while fumbling a leather ball, this was a MASTERPIECE! üé® The final score: **Wyrmwood Stronghammers 1, The Tortell Privateers 0**! And it took OVERTIME to decide it!

The action started fast and brutal, just the way I like it! The Privateers barely had time to adjust to the humming earth before **Cornela Piscatelli** laid the boom on Keisling Damalas! A crunching tackle that sent Damalas straight to the sidelines! That is how you say 'Hello' in Wyrmwood! üëã

The shooting, however... well, let's just say the goals were safe for most of the night. Sabian Gleason had a couple of looks early on and missed them both! Maybe counting clouds before the game distracted him from the actual target! Hah!

The Privateers didn't take the abuse lying down, though. **Kidder Starkey** delivered a receipt to the home team, absolutely flattening Kerwin Gasper with a tackle that rattled teeth all the way back in Cedar Hill! It was a medic's nightmare out there! üöë

We saw some brave running from Autumn Jodoin, who tried to spark the Stronghammers' offense, but **Lilithe Royce** was there to shut it down! Lilithe stuck to Autumn like those leeches they use for their ritual! Another injury! The bodies were piling up faster than paperwork on Sir Tanos's desk!

Mid-game turned into a comedy of errors! Odelia Abbott passed to Sabian, and... dropped! Melisande Eustacia tried to shoot... missed! Ultun Barthelemy tried to shoot... missed! It was pathetic! I haven't seen aim that bad since the heroes tried to find the Demon Prison without a map! üòÇ

But the violence? Oh, the violence was consistent! We have to talk about the tragedy of Keisling Damalas. The Privateers' healer, Eugen Zacks, did a great job patching them up and sending them back out... only for **Kerwin Gasper** to IMMEDIATELY break them in half again! That is the ruthless aggression I live for! Kick 'em while they're fresh!

Regulation ended in a 0-0 tie, a testament to the defensive slaughter we witnessed. We went to OVERTIME! The tension was palpable! The exhaustion was real! And the mistakes were amplifying!

Overtime was pure chaos! üå™Ô∏è Turnovers everywhere! Ultun Barthelemy threw a wild pass intercepted by Ellan Elburt! Loralee Sunny returned the favor by throwing an interception straight to Autumn Jodoin! Nobody wanted to win! It was like they were allergic to victory!

Finally, FINALLY, the deadlock broke! After Ellan Elburt took out Kerwin Gasper (again!), the Stronghammers found a gap. **Sabian Gleason** connected with **Sondra Elaina** in the End Zone for the game-winning dunk! THE CROWD ERUPTED! üèÄ

The Wyrmwood Stronghammers defend The Hollow Mine! The Privateers are going back to their fancy resort with nothing but bruises and shame! Elspeth Ortell can try to 'make things happen', but she couldn't make a win happen tonight! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off! Remember, if you can't win, make sure the other guy can't walk! Goodnight, Osterra! üåô
